ganoderma wilt
KccAns: Up root and burn diseased palm and add 100 g Mancozeb 75 WPOR 100 g Captan 80 WPOR 30 ml Thiram 75 WSOR 15 ml Aureofungin to the 3 deep pit and mix Fill the pit a month after Root feeding with 30 ml Hexaconazole in 100 ml of water once in 3 months Incorporate to the soil 5 kg neem oil cake  50 g Trichoderma viride  10 kg compost plant Repeat the treatment at an interval of 6 months over a period of 2 years

QueryText: ASKING ABOUT GANODERMA WILT MANAGEMENT IN COCONUT
KccAns: Remove and destroy dead palms and palms in advanced stages ofthe disease Isolate diseased palms from healthy palms by digging isolationtrenches of 1 m deep and 30 cm wide Avoid flood irrigation and provide regular basin irrigation duringsummer Apply 50 kg farmyard manure  5 kg neem cake enriched withTrichodermapalmyear Grow banana as intercrop wherever possible Soil drenching of 1 Bordeaux mixture  40 litrespalm thrice ina year Root feeding of 2 g Aureofungin- sol  1 g CuSO4 in 100 ml ofwater or Hexaconazole 2-3ml 100ml or Calixin 2ml  100mlat quarterly interval

QueryText: GANODERMA WILT IN COCONUT
KccAns: Trunk injection  root feeding with Calixin 3 mltree

QueryText: ASKING ABOUT GANODERMA WILT DISEASE MANAGEMENT IN COCONUT
KccAns: Remove and destroy dead palms and palms in advanced stages ofthe disease Isolate diseased palms from healthy palms by digging isolationtrenches of 1 m deep and 30 cm wide Avoid flood irrigation and provide regular basin irrigation duringsummer Apply 50 kg farmyard manure  5 kg neem cake enriched withTrichodermapalmyear Grow banana as intercrop wherever possible Soil drenching of 1 Bordeaux mixture  40 litrespalm thrice ina year Root feeding of 2 g Aureofungin- sol  1 g CuSO4 in 100 ml ofwater or Hexaconazole 2-3ml 100ml or Calixin 2ml  100mlat quarterly interval It will be effective only in the initial stages ofdisease
